title: Food Delivery Web App
description: A user-friendly food delivery web application developed using the MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, and NodeJS) that allows users to create and modify profiles, and order food from various restaurants.

title: News Video Ticker Text to Audio Conversion System
description: A system developed using computer vision, OCR and text-to-speech (TTS) techniques in Python to convert scrolling news ticker text in live English news video streams into clear and smooth audio in real-time.

title: Video Content Engagement - Data Service (RESTful API)
description: A model implementation of a video content engagement data service for OTT clients, that consists of a RESTful API capable of performing CRUD operations from HTTP requests, using Spring Boot (a back-end Java framework).

title: Card-Matching Memory Game
description: A single player card-matching game developed using HTML, CSS and JavaScript with three difficulty levels that tests your memory skills.

title: Comic Generation Application
description: An application designed using Python, GPT-3 and DALL-E APIs to help users create their own comic image stories by providing the premise of the plot and a set of plot keywords as input.

title: Brick-Breaker Ball Game
description: A classic single player game developed using core Java and Java Swing techniques with a simple user interface where the objective is to break a setup of bricks using a bouncing ball and a paddle that can be moved using arrow keys.
